AboutMeSection.title: Let me introduce myself
AboutMeSection.content: Hi! My name is Dominik, and I am passionate about creating modern web applications. I am fascinated by the world of frontend development, and my goal is to continuously improve myself as a skilled Frontend Developer. Every day, I dedicate time to learning in order to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technological solutions. I love exploring innovative approaches to problem-solving. Besides programming, I am also interested in Astronomy and Aviation.

ConnectWithMeSection.title: Find me on
ConnectWithMeSection.subtitle: Feel free to connect with me

aboutsection.title1: Hello everyone, my name is Dominik!

aboutme.subtitle: About Me
aboutme.content: I am a Frontend Developer with a passion for creating modern websites. I have over a year of experience in the IT industry, mainly in the field of technology, information, and the Internet. I graduated with a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Warmia and Mazury in Olsztyn, specializing in "Data Science in practice."; I am a person who is organized and focused on achieving goals, communicative, eager to develop, and open to new challenges and experiences.

hobby.subtitle: Hobbies
hobby.content: Besides my professional interests, I am passionate about new technologies. Additionally, I have an interest in astronomy and aviation. These areas not only intrigue me but also motivate me to continue learning and exploring.
